title: 57. Doctors Know They Prescribe Too Many Antibiotics. Why Don’t They Stop?
description: Antibiotics save lives. But what happens when we use them too much? Bapu looks at how changing physician behavior could help prevent a major public health disaster.
author: bapu@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: Antibiotics save lives. But what happens when we use them too much? Bapu looks at how changing physician behavior could help prevent a major public health disaster.
